root.name: abs()

example.code: a = abs(153)# Sets 'a' to 153 b = abs(-15)# Sets 'b' to 15 c = abs(12.234)# Sets 'c' to 12.234 d = abs(-9.23)# Sets 'd' to 9.23

root.description: 数値の絶対値（大きさ）を計算します。 数値の絶対値は常に正です。

parameter.label: n
parameter.description: any numberical value, usually an int or float
